2094.subject: ISSM
2094.descrlong: This ground-breaking Learning Experience from the genre of World Mythology will explore the historical existence, patriarchal suppression of, and the burgeoning rebirth of this "once and future" astro-biological tradition and its significance for gender equity, ecological awareness and earth stewardship, and a cross-cultural appreciation for the important role women have played and still play in creating human and "cosmic" history.
